# Scenario ID: LRN-2-0010
# Functional Area: Learning
# Status: AUTO-GENERATED
# Confidence: 8.0/10.0
# Original Task: Run the report "View Security Group" and select the respective security group:
For User Based Security Groups (i.e. Administrators), select "Members" to view the list of assigned users.
For Role Based Security Groups (i.e. Partners), select "Assignable Role" to get the list of current role assignments. Verify that the Assignee(s) are assigned to the appropriate Organization(s).
#======================================================================

# Task: Run the report "View Security Group" and select the respective security group:
For User Based Security Groups (i.e. Administrators), select "Members" to view the list of assigned users.
For Role Based Security Groups (i.e. Partners), select "Assignable Role" to get the list of current role assignments. Verify that the Assignee(s) are assigned to the appropriate Organization(s).
